topic_description: Food and Dining research applies computational methods to recipe generation, nutrition optimization, flavor pairing, food recognition, and culinary innovation. This field explores how AI can assist in menu planning, dietary recommendations, ingredient substitution, and understanding taste preferences. Researchers investigate techniques for analyzing food chemistry, predicting flavor combinations, creating personalized meal plans, and developing systems that balance nutritional needs with cultural preferences and sustainability considerations.
